ref: 1131 *ātr̥ptika ʻ satisfied ʼ. [Cf. āˊtr̥pati ʻ is satisfied ʼ RV., ātarpaṇa -- n. ʻ satisfaction ʼ; ʻ whitening walls on festive occasions, pigment therefor ʼ lex., Pk. āippaṇa -- n. <-> √tr̥p]
Kho. arti, arthi, (Lor.) *lrti, *lhrti or arthi ʻ satisfying, satiated, plenteous ʼ, artiéik, arthi˚ ʻ to fill, satisfy with food ʼ (< *arirti < *adirti).
